price: (21) Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allāh, it would have been better for them.
arabic: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ
